defineservice.name: metratech.com/BulkEventRatesPT
defineservice.description: Parameter table for configuring BulkEventRates Decision attributes

ptype.description: Tier start for the range of number of events covered by the bulk event rates decision.
Tier end for the range of number of events covered by the bulk event rates decision.
Override rate for the events if the number of events falls within the StartOfEventCountRange to EndOfEventCountRange number of events.
